rows.label: qev093103_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hah! So you CAN walk the walk!
No wonder the Princess took a shine to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0020
rows.name:
Seeing you go toe-to-toe with Ares like that...
No one in the force could do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0030
rows.name:
I heard you suffer from memory loss.
You sure you weren't one of the elite?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0040
rows.name: Eh, not that it matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0050
rows.name: Safe to say, you proved it—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0055
rows.name: You're a fitting addition to the heroic pantheon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0060
rows.name:
To be totally honest, forget watching my back—
I'm tempted to hand Ares to you right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0070
rows.name:
...Unlucky, though.
You fell just short of the mark. By a whisker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0080
rows.name: Now, chill out! I'm not breaking my promise, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0085
rows.name: I'm just crossing my t's here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0090
rows.name:
Listen, if you want to pilot Ares,
there's something even more important than a real body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0100
rows.name: Can you guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_SEL0110
rows.name: Talent

rows.label: qev093103_JNK0120
rows.name: Say you need the makings of a hero.

rows.label: qev093103_SEL0130
rows.name: Strength

rows.label: qev093103_JNK0140
rows.name: Say you need overwhelming power.

rows.label: qev093103_SEL0150
rows.name: Ability

rows.label: qev093103_JNK0160
rows.name: Say you need mad Skell-flying skills.

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0170
rows.name: Wrong. Nice try, but it's not what really counts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0180
rows.name:
It's the heart. The will to live on through it all.
The urge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0190
rows.name: What it is, is "love."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0200
rows.name:
Have you got it in you to love?
And I'm not talking marriage vows here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0210
rows.name:
To love all of creation...
To embrace the world and all its parts, fully.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0220
rows.name:
Until you're ready to do that,
I can't hand Ares over to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0230
rows.name:
Hey, don't feel bad.
You show promise, and that's worth a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0240
rows.name:
Someday it'll fall into place for you too.
And what I say goes, period.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0250
rows.name:
For the record, I'm not just blowing smoke.
I've got my serious hat on here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0260
rows.name:
You've managed to win me over...
Now prove it to me. Show me it wasn't for nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093103_MSG0270
rows.name: Okay? Future hero?[ST:wait ]
